text: La mia risposta is Italian singer-songwriter Laura Pausini’s fifth studio album, issued by CGD East West (Warner) Records in 1998. Mi respuesta is its Spanish language edition for the hispanophone market. Between February and April 1999, the La mia risposta World Tour '99 was held to support and promote the album in Europe. The album was not as successful as her previous one, Le cose che vivi.
